languages.text: {n}От едкого смеха ксеноса бегут мурашки.{/n} "Позволь другим пачкать руки. Один маяк — и на затронутые ульи обрушится рейд моих родичей. Возможно, зацепят кого-то... но когда они закончат — живых в гнездах твоих врагов не останется".

{n}The caustic laugh of the xenos sends shivers down your spine.{/n} "Let others sully their hands. Just one beacon — and my kinsmen will crash down upon the affected hives. Perhaps they may cause some additional casualties here and there... but, have no doubt, none of your enemies will survive, even hiding in their little nests."
languages.original_text: {n}От едкого смеха ксеноса бегут мурашки.{/n} "Позволь другим пачкать руки. Один маяк — и на затронутые ульи обрушится рейд моих родичей. Возможно, зацепят кого-то... но когда они закончат — живых в гнездах твоих врагов не останется".

traits.locale_text: {n}The caustic laugh of the xenos sends the shivers down your spine.{/n} "Let the others sully their hands. One beacon — and a raid of my kinsmen will crash down on the affected hives. Perhaps they may cause some casualties here and there... but there will be no survivors in the eyries of your enemies after they are done."

{n}The caustic laugh of the xenos sends the shivers down your spine.{/n} "Let the others sully their hands. One beacon — and a raid of my kinsmen will crash down on the affected hives. Perhaps they may cause some casualties here and there... but there will be no survivors in the eyries of your enemies after they are done."

{n}The caustic laugh of the xenos sends shivers down your spine.{/n} "Let others sully their hands. Just one beacon — and my kinsmen will crash down upon the affected hives. Perhaps they may cause some additional casualties here and there... but, have no doubt, none of your enemies will survive, even hiding in their little nests."

{n}The caustic laugh of the xenos sends shivers down your spine.{/n} "Let others sully their hands. Just one beacon — and my kinsmen will crash down upon the affected hives. Perhaps they may cause some additional casualties here and there... but, have no doubt, none of your enemies will survive, even hiding in their little nests."

{n}The caustic laugh of the xenos sends shivers down your spine.{/n} "Let others sully their hands. Just one beacon — and my kinsmen will crash down upon the affected hives. Perhaps they may cause some additional casualties here and there... but, have no doubt, none of your enemies will survive, even hiding in their little nests."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋刻薄的笑声让你脊背发冷。{/n}“就让别人来干这些脏活吧。只要一个信标，我的族人就会扑向受影响的巢都。或许他们会在那些地方造成一些额外伤亡……但毫无疑问，你的敌人一个都活不下来，就算他们躲进自己的小巢里也无济于事。”
languages.original_text: {n}The caustic laugh of the xenos sends shivers down your spine.{/n} "Let others sully their hands. Just one beacon — and my kinsmen will crash down upon the affected hives. Perhaps they may cause some additional casualties here and there... but, have no doubt, none of your enemies will survive, even hiding in their little nests."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋刻薄的笑声让你脊背发冷。{/n}“就让别人来干这些脏活吧。只要一个信标，我的族人就会扑向受影响的巢都。或许他们会在那些地方造成一些额外伤亡……但毫无疑问，你的敌人一个都活不下来，就算他们躲进自己的小巢里也无济于事。”

languages.text: {n}La risa sarcástica de los xenos te produce escalofríos.{/n} «Deja que otros manchen sus manos. Una sola baliza y mis parientes caerán sobre las colmenas afectadas. Tal vez causen algunas bajas adicionales aquí y allá... pero, no lo dudes, ninguno de tus enemigos sobrevivirá, ni siquiera escondido en sus pequeños nidos».
languages.original_text: {n}The caustic laugh of the xenos sends shivers down your spine.{/n} "Let others sully their hands. Just one beacon — and my kinsmen will crash down upon the affected hives. Perhaps they may cause some additional casualties here and there... but, have no doubt, none of your enemies will survive, even hiding in their little nests."

traits.locale_text: {n}La risa sarcástica de los xenos te produce escalofríos.{/n} «Deja que otros manchen sus manos. Una sola baliza y mis parientes caerán sobre las colmenas afectadas. Tal vez causen algunas bajas adicionales aquí y allá... pero, no lo dudes, ninguno de tus enemigos sobrevivirá, ni siquiera escondido en sus pequeños nidos».

languages.text: {n}ゼノの苛烈な笑い声に背筋が凍る。{/n}「他の者に手を汚させるとしよう。たった1つのビーコンで...私の親族が、影響を受けたハイヴに激突する。もしかしたら、あちこちで死傷者が出るかもしれない...だが、小さな巣穴に隠れていようとも、敵は間違いなく誰一人生き残れないだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}The caustic laugh of the xenos sends shivers down your spine.{/n} "Let others sully their hands. Just one beacon — and my kinsmen will crash down upon the affected hives. Perhaps they may cause some additional casualties here and there... but, have no doubt, none of your enemies will survive, even hiding in their little nests."

traits.locale_text: {n}ゼノの苛烈な笑い声に背筋が凍る。{/n}「他の者に手を汚させるとしよう。たった1つのビーコンで...私の親族が、影響を受けたハイヴに激突する。もしかしたら、あちこちで死傷者が出るかもしれない...だが、小さな巣穴に隠れていようとも、敵は間違いなく誰一人生き残れないだろう」

languages.text: {n}Son rire acerbe vous fait frissonner.{/n} « Laissons d'autres se salir les mains. Il nous suffit d'activer une balise pour que les miens frappent les ruches affectées. Bien sûr, il risque d'y avoir quelques dommages collatéraux ici et là... mais aucun ennemi n'y survivra, je vous le garantis. »
languages.original_text: {n}The caustic laugh of the xenos sends shivers down your spine.{/n} "Let others sully their hands. Just one beacon — and my kinsmen will crash down upon the affected hives. Perhaps they may cause some additional casualties here and there... but, have no doubt, none of your enemies will survive, even hiding in their little nests."

traits.locale_text: {n}Son rire acerbe vous fait frissonner.{/n} « Laissons d'autres se salir les mains. Il nous suffit d'activer une balise pour que les miens frappent les ruches affectées. Bien sûr, il risque d'y avoir quelques dommages collatéraux ici et là... mais aucun ennemi n'y survivra, je vous le garantis. »

languages.text: {n}Das beißende Lachen des Xenos jagt dir einen Schauer den Rücken hinunter.{/n} "Sollen andere sich die Hände schmutzig machen. Ein Wort reicht — und mein Volk wird über die betroffenen Makropolen herfallen. Gut, es wird vielleicht hier und da ein paar zusätzliche Opfer geben ... aber keiner Eurer Feinde wird überleben, selbst wenn sie sich in ihren kleinen Nestern verstecken."
languages.original_text: {n}The caustic laugh of the xenos sends shivers down your spine.{/n} "Let others sully their hands. Just one beacon — and my kinsmen will crash down upon the affected hives. Perhaps they may cause some additional casualties here and there... but, have no doubt, none of your enemies will survive, even hiding in their little nests."
